Class MutualFund

extends Investment

      • sell

        public int sell​(java.lang.String priceInput,
                java.lang.String quantityInput,
                javax.swing.JTextArea feedbackTextArea)
         throws java.lang.Exception
        method updates the quantity and book value after selling, and calculates payment received
        Specified by:
        sell in class Investment
        Parameters:
        priceInput - string representation of selling price of investment
        quantityInput - string representation of quantity of investment sold
        feedbackTextArea - JTextArea to output feedback to
        Returns:
        1 if some of investment successfully sold, 0 if investment sold off (no remaining quantity), -1 if selling quantity exceeds owned quantity
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
